<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- NVPTXLowerArgs.cpp - Lower arguments ------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Arguments to kernel and device functions are passed via param space,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which imposes certain restrictions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#state-spaces</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Kernel parameters are read-only and accessible only via ld.param</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction, directly or via a pointer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Device function parameters are directly accessible via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld.param/st.param, but taking the address of one returns a pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a copy created in local space which &#42;can&#39;t&#42; be used with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ld.param/st.param.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copying a byval struct into local memory in IR allows us to enforce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the param space restrictions, gives the rest of IR a pointer w/o</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// param space restrictions, and gives us an opportunity to eliminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pointer arguments to kernel functions need more work to be lowered:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Convert non-byval pointer arguments of CUDA kernels to pointers in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    global address space. This allows later optimizations to emit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    ld.global.&#42;/st.global.&#42; for accessing these pointer arguments. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(float&#42; %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %v = load float, float&#42; %input, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(float&#42; %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input2 = addrspacecast float&#42; %input to float addrspace(1)&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input3 = addrspacecast float addrspace(1)&#42; %input2 to float&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %v = load float, float&#42; %input3, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Later, NVPTXInferAddressSpaces will optimize it to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(float&#42; %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input2 = addrspacecast float&#42; %input to float addrspace(1)&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %v = load float, float addrspace(1)&#42; %input2, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Convert byval kernel parameters to pointers in the param address space</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (so that NVPTX emits ld/st.param).  Convert pointers &#42;within&#42; a byval</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    kernel parameter to pointers in the global address space. This allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    NVPTX to emit ld/st.global.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    struct S &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      int &#42;x;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      int &#42;y;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#95;&#95;global&#95;&#95; void foo(S s) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      int &#42;b = s.y;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      // use b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &quot;b&quot; points to the global address space. In the IR level,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(ptr byval %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %b&#95;ptr = getelementptr &#123;ptr, ptr&#125;, ptr %input, i64 0, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %b = load ptr, ptr %b&#95;ptr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ; use %b</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(&#123;i32&#42;, i32&#42;&#125;&#42; byval %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %b&#95;param = addrspacecat ptr %input to ptr addrspace(101)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %b&#95;ptr = getelementptr &#123;ptr, ptr&#125;, ptr addrspace(101) %b&#95;param, i64 0, i32 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %b = load ptr, ptr addrspace(101) %b&#95;ptr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %b&#95;global = addrspacecast ptr %b to ptr addrspace(1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ; use %b&#95;generic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Create a local copy of kernel byval parameters used in a way that &#42;might&#42; mutate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the parameter, by storing it in an alloca. Mutations to &quot;grid&#95;constant&quot; parameters</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    are undefined behaviour, and don&#39;t require local copies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(ptr byval(%struct.s) align 4 %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       store i32 42, ptr %input</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(ptr byval(%struct.s) align 4 %input) #1 &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input1 = alloca %struct.s, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input2 = addrspacecast ptr %input to ptr addrspace(101)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input3 = load %struct.s, ptr addrspace(101) %input2, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      store %struct.s %input3, ptr %input1, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      store i32 42, ptr %input1, align 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    If %input were passed to a device function, or written to memory,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    conservatively assume that %input gets mutated, and create a local copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Convert param pointers to grid&#95;constant byval kernel parameters that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    passed into calls (device functions, intrinsics, inline asm), or otherwise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &quot;escape&quot; (into stores/ptrtoints) to the generic address space, using the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#96;nvvm.ptr.param.to.gen&#96; intrinsic, so that NVPTX emits cvta.param</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    (available for sm70+)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(ptr byval(%struct.s) %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ; %input is a grid&#95;constant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %call = call i32 @escape(ptr %input)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    becomes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    define void @foo(ptr byval(%struct.s) %input) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input1 = addrspacecast ptr %input to ptr addrspace(101)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ; the following intrinsic converts pointer to generic. We don&#39;t use an addrspacecast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ; to prevent generic -&gt; param -&gt; generic from getting cancelled out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %input1.gen = call ptr @llvm.nvvm.ptr.param.to.gen.p0.p101(ptr addrspace(101) %input1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      %call = call i32 @escape(ptr %input1.gen)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      ret void</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: merge this pass with NVPTXInferAddressSpaces so that other passes don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cancel the addrspacecast pair this pass emits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/lib/target/nvptx/mctargetdesc/nvptxbaseinfo-h">MCTargetDesc/NVPTXBaseInfo.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptx-h">NVPTX.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxtargetmachine-h">NVPTXTargetMachine.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxutilities-h">NVPTXUtilities.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">llvm/ADT/STLExtras.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Knowing Ptr must point to the global address space, this function</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#aa32acddd7ce41e4abc90f0f065a202ab"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#aa32acddd7ce41e4abc90f0f065a202ab">ID</a>; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pass identification, replacement for typeid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#ab3f038dfd1eb8adccb5ad1b0e92810d1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#ab3f038dfd1eb8adccb5ad1b0e92810d1">NVPTXLowerArgs</a>() : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functionpass/#a7691d83e3561f781cae4ce4a01bdfa93">FunctionPass</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#aa32acddd7ce41e4abc90f0f065a202ab">ID</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#aa32acddd7ce41e4abc90f0f065a202ab">NVPTXLowerArgs::ID</a> = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="#a0370c56be3c5d1e1fd720eff6878a0d2"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#aaa970fc931c1c63037a8182e028d04b1">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;BEGIN</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#ab3f038dfd1eb8adccb5ad1b0e92810d1">NVPTXLowerArgs</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;nvptx-lower-args&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Lower arguments (NVPTX)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a14724f1ccf528e73bb29bc9230737967">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;DEPENDENCY</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetpassconfig">TargetPassConfig</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199" lineLink="#a4d6da696b3c753c5e5fbcc4d21d4cb71"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/passsupport-h/#a74ce8276b89067e806f67c45a6d92575">INITIALIZE&#95;PASS&#95;END</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-nvptxlowerargs-cpp-/nvptxlowerargs/#ab3f038dfd1eb8adccb5ad1b0e92810d1">NVPTXLowerArgs</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;nvptx-lower-args&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="#a27a0ca182c45d386e77d15f3399d7cde"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Lower arguments (NVPTX)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/false">false</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =============================================================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the function had a byval struct ptr arg, say foo(%struct.x&#42; byval %d),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and we can&#39;t guarantee that the only accesses are loads,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then add the following instructions to the first basic block:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %temp = alloca %struct.x, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %tempd = addrspacecast %struct.x&#42; %d to %struct.x addrspace(101)&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %tv = load %struct.x addrspace(101)&#42; %tempd</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store %struct.x %tv, %struct.x&#42; %temp, align 8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The above code allocates some space in the stack and copies the incoming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// struct from param space to local space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then replace all occurrences of %d by %temp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In case we know that all users are GEPs or Loads, replace them with the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ones in parameter AS, so we can access them using ld.param.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =============================================================================</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For Loads, replaces the \\p OldUse of the pointer with a Use of the same</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we know that all argument loads are using addresses in parameter space</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and we can finally remove the old instructions in generic AS.  Instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduled for removal should be processed in reverse order so the ones</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// closest to the load are deleted first. Otherwise they may still be in use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g if we have Value = Load(BitCast(GEP(arg))), InstructionsToDelete will</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">llvm::reverse</a>(InstructionsToDelete))</span></CodeLine>
